attributes.action: When kids go back in February make sure there is a 2 metre distancing in schools
attributes.additional_details: So we can stop the spread of coronavirus and keep everyone safe
attributes.background: When kids go back we need to make sure that schools are making sure everyone is 2 metres so no covid spreads no one sitting on the same table make a 2 metre social distancing in schools

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Guidance already requires schools to prevent the spread of coronavirus by minimising contact between individuals and maintaining social distancing wherever
possible. See:
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/actions-for-schools-during-the-coronavirus-outbreak

The Prime Minister also announced to the House of Commons on 27 January that the Government does not plan to commence the reopening of schools before Monday 8 March. See:
https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/prime-ministers-statement-to-the-house-of-commons-on-coronavirus-27-january-2021
